snippet: Voters trying to understand the policies of Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan are going to have a harder time than ever.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan for actively trying to obscure their positions on many issues, as if a clear understanding of their beliefs about taxes, health care or spending would scare away voters; offers examples of the ways in which Republicans are sowing confusion.
lead_paragraph: Voters trying to understand the policies of Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan are going to have a harder time than ever.

headline.seo: The Shallow End of the Campaign
headline.main: The Shallow End of the Campaign
headline.print_headline: The Shallow End of the Campaign
